orderedMerchandiseTop10: SELECT koName AS name,COUNT(koName)AS y FROM proxy.orderedMerchandise inner join proxy.merchandise on orderedMerchandise.merchandiseId=merchandise.id WHERE status not in('UNPAID','CANCELED')GROUP BY koName ORDER BY y DESC LIMIT 10;
refundedMerchandiseTop10: SELECT koName AS name,COUNT(koName)AS y FROM proxy.orderedMerchandise inner join proxy.merchandise on orderedMerchandise.merchandiseId=merchandise.id WHERE status='CANCELED'GROUP BY koName ORDER BY y DESC LIMIT 10;
timeRelatedOrder: SELECT(CASE WHEN HOUR(createdAt)BETWEEN 0 AND 2 THEN'24~02시'WHEN HOUR(createdAt)BETWEEN 3 AND 5 THEN'03~05시'WHEN HOUR(createdAt)BETWEEN 6 AND 8 THEN'06~08시'WHEN HOUR(createdAt)BETWEEN 09 AND 11 THEN'09~11시'WHEN HOUR(createdAt)BETWEEN 12 AND 14 THEN'12~14시'WHEN HOUR(createdAt)BETWEEN 15 AND 17 THEN'15~17시'WHEN HOUR(createdAt)BETWEEN 16 AND 18 THEN'16~18시'WHEN HOUR(createdAt)BETWEEN 19 AND 21 THEN'19~21시'WHEN HOUR(createdAt)BETWEEN 22 AND 23 THEN'22~23시'END)AS name,COUNT(*)AS y FROM proxy.order WHERE status NOT IN('CANCELED','UNPAID')group by name order by name asc;
